_comment: This is a template for mcpb-config.json. Copy this file to mcpb-config.json and fill in your values.
_usage: The build script will inject these values as defaults in manifest.json during the .mcpb build process
_notes: github_client_id: Get from GitHub OAuth App settings (starts with 'Iv')
github_client_secret: Get from GitHub OAuth App settings
default_owner: Your GitHub username or organization name
default_repo: Default repository name (users can override at runtime)
